title: PlayStation Store Closing on PS3, Vita? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.22.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about PlayStation Store closing its doors on PS3, Vita, and PSP, Resident Evil's 25th anniversary, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:04 - Housekeeping
PSILY XOXO is recording later today. Remember if you’re on Patreon you can catch that live at noon, otherwise you can catch that everywhere: Tuesday on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and Podcast Services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Mick @DaNanoBiologist Abrahamson, Black Jack, & Trent Berrie
The Roper Report   -
00:05:45 - PS3, Vita, And PSP Stores could Be Permanently Closed In A Few Months - Kirk Mckeand @ The Gamer
00:07:30 - When will people realize that the value of backwards compatibility goes beyond the idea of a small section of fans wanting to play 'old games'? - Best Friends Q:Dee-Kej
00:17:20 - Capcom is celebrating Resident Evil’s 25th anniversary - Blog post
00:23:15 - ‘Marvel’s Avengers’ Sees 5x Player Increase After Hawkeye’s Release - Paul Tassi @ Forbes
00:27:28 - Tech news: A shortage in computer chips has reached a “crisis point” - Mark Sweney @ The Guardian
00:32:25 -  Ad
00:37:20 - Fallout 76 has announced their 2021 roadmap - Ethan Gach @ Kotaku
00:39:40 - Valve blocks Super Seducer 3 from Steam - Matthew Handrahan @ GiBiz
00:43:10 - A Media Molecule Studio Director is receiving BAFTA's Highest Honour - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:48:230 - Out today
00:50:45 - Squad Up:Vii(PSN) - Viis_life
00:52:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Gary Whitta
